description: Nothing but The Butt Hutt Smokehouse could put Florida on the BBQ map.Using secret family recipes to make their smoked meats and made-from-scratch sides, they enlist an arsenal of savory spices, chilis and herbs, along with citrus and light brown sugar to make their meals so superb. Of course, copious amounts of love, as well as the smoke of fresh local pecan wood, all help too.Their meats are seasoned with their signature spicy rubs but you can be the boss and choose which Butt Hutt sauce is best for you. For some flavorful Florida-style BBQ, strut over to The Butt Hutt Truck..we’ll hear no buts about it!
name: The Butt Hutt Smokehouse
